description: This Java class 'HelloController' is a REST controller for a Spring Boot application. It provides basic endpoints: a welcome message at '/', a redirect to Swagger UI at '/docs', a health check at '/health', and application info at '/api/info'. It uses annotations for API documentation and request mapping.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the application, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root endpoint '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI at '/swagger-ui.html', preserving the original request scheme, host, and port

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' status indicating application health
